rules.description: SpaceFN: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space+Enter to Space and Enter (hold to repeat Enter)
SpaceFN: Disable SpaceFN mode after last typing
SpaceFN: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space+Enter to Space and Enter (hold to repeat Enter)
+ SpaceFN: Space+[esdf] to Up, Left, Down, Right (Filco Minila)
+ SpaceFN: Space+[k,l.] to Home, End, PageUp, PageDown (Filco Minila)
+ SpaceFN: Space+[jm;] to Insert, Delete, Backspace (Filco Minila)
SpaceFN: Disable SpaceFN mode after last typing
+ SpaceFN: Space+[jm;] to Insert, Delete, Backspace (Filco Minila)
